channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Silencer - NK
channel.description:
ow the edge credit to @Tormental for the convict, slasher, and strangler ideas in camp cadaver :open_mouth:
Silencer (Neutral Killing)
Passive 1: **The Penny Stays**- Attempts to kill or occupy you will fail. It will show as a success to the player.
Passive 2: **Marking**- Anybody who occupies you or investigates you will be marked for death. The player will not be aware of this. Marking a player thrice or more makes them immune to this form of death.
Day Ability 1: **Shush** Silence a player. They cannot talk unless put on trial , and if they talk before then , kill them in the day. If someone dies by this method, you can't use this ability again. (3 uses)
Night Ability 1: **Silent Night** Kill a player. Mark all those that visit them. (Infinite Uses)
Night Ability 2: **Sleep Tight** Kill all marked players. (Infinite Uses)
Goal: Same as Poss/Reaper
